item.title: @elonmusk: China electricity generation is still growing super fast, with solar being the largest incremental c...
item.description: China electricity generation is still growing super fast, with solar being the largest incremental contributor, and will exceed America by a factor of 3X either this year or next

item.title: @elonmusk: The US continues to fall behind China. We have to go all in on solar + batteries with nuclear for so...
item.description: The US continues to fall behind China. We have to go all in on solar + batteries with nuclear for some special cases. Energy is a measure of the work being done.

item.title: @elonmusk: Just the very early stages of the singularity. We are currently using much less than a billionth of ...
item.description: Just the very early stages of the singularity. We are currently using much less than a billionth of the power of our Sun.

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk: ‚ÄúI do see a path to 100 gigawatts a year of AI powered space solar satellites. If you do ...
item.description: Elon Musk: ‚ÄúI do see a path to 100 gigawatts a year of AI powered space solar satellites. If you do a million tons of payload to orbit per year with 100 kilowatts per ton, that's 100 gigawatts of solar powered AI satellites per year. There's a path to get to a terawatt per year, then you want to make those AI satellites on the moon and use a mass driver.‚Äù

item.title: @elonmusk: I worked most of the weekend too. Still do. Only left the Tesla engineering lab in Palo Alto a few h...
item.description: I worked most of the weekend too. Still do. Only left the Tesla engineering lab in Palo Alto a few hours ago.

item.title: @elonmusk: "Elon Musk still works incredibly hard. I visited him recently, I left around midnight and he was st...
item.description: "Elon Musk still works incredibly hard. I visited him recently, I left around midnight and he was still working. I think he must have gone till 2am. So I don't know anybody who works as hard as him. He's really in the technical details of it." ‰∏Ä David Sacks

item.title: @elonmusk: Melania doc tracking ~$8M opening - best for a documentary in 10 years. Congrats,@FLOTUS! You could ...
item.description: Melania doc tracking ~$8M opening - best for a documentary in 10 years. Congrats,@FLOTUS! You could tell Pres Trump is proud of her, joking as if threatened by her success at an event. She‚Äôs a classy lady; love her advocacy for the hostages and AI education, and quiet strength.

item.title: @elonmusk: Of course. They are trying to deflect responsibility to me from the truly guilty. I have NOT been to...
item.description: Of course. They are trying to deflect responsibility to me from the truly guilty. I have NOT been to any of Epstein‚Äôs party, his plane or his island. But many others have. Those who have committed serious crimes need to be prosecuted.
